movie.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
movie.plot: A rogue band of resistance fighters unite for a mission to steal the Death Star plans and bring a new hope to the galaxy.
movie.actors: Felicity Jones, Diego Luna, Alan Tudyk, Donnie Yen
movie.writer: Chris Weitz (screenplay), Tony Gilroy (screenplay), John Knoll (story by), Gary Whitta (story by), George Lucas (based on characters created by)

movie.title: Split
movie.plot: Though Kevin has evidenced 23 personalities to his trusted psychiatrist, Dr. Fletcher, there remains one still submerged who is set to materialize and dominate all the others. Compelled to abduct three teenage girls led by the willful, observant Casey, Kevin reaches a war for survival among all of those contained within him — as well as everyone around him — as the walls between his compartments shatter apart.
movie.actors: James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy, Betty Buckley, Haley Lu Richardson

movie.title: Sing
movie.plot: A koala named Buster recruits his best friend to help him drum up business for his theater by hosting a singing competition.
movie.actors: Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane, Scarlett Johansson

movie.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
movie.plot: In 1926, Newt Scamander arrives at the Magical Congress of the United States of America with a magically expanded briefcase, which houses a number of dangerous creatures and their habitats. When the creatures escape from the briefcase, it sends the American wizarding authorities after Newt, and threatens to strain even further the state of magical and non-magical relations.
movie.actors: Eddie Redmayne, Sam Redford, Scott Goldman, Tim Bentinck

movie.title: The Lost City of Z
movie.plot: A true-life drama, centering on British explorer Col. Percival Fawcett, who disappeared while searching for a mysterious city in the Amazon in the 1920s.
movie.actors: Charlie Hunnam, Sienna Miller, Tom Holland, Robert Pattinson
movie.writer: James Gray (written for the screen by), David Grann (based on the book "The Lost City of Z: A Tale of Deadly Obsession in the Amazon" by)

movie.title: Moana
movie.plot: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by Maui reaches an impetuous Chieftain's daughter's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the demigod to set things right.
movie.actors: Auli'i Cravalho, Dwayne Johnson, Rachel House, Temuera Morrison
movie.director: Ron Clements, Don Hall, John Musker, Chris Williams
movie.writer: Jared Bush (screenplay), Ron Clements (story by), John Musker (story by), Chris Williams (story by), Don Hall (story by), Pamela Ribon (story by), Aaron Kandell (story by), Jordan Kandell (story by)

movie.title: La La Land
movie.plot: Mia, an aspiring actress, serves lattes to movie stars in between auditions and Sebastian, a jazz musician, scrapes by playing cocktail party gigs in dingy bars, but as success mounts they are faced with decisions that begin to fray the fragile fabric of their love affair, and the dreams they worked so hard to maintain in each other threaten to rip them apart.
movie.actors: Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone, Amiée Conn, Terry Walters

movie.title: The Void
movie.plot: In the middle of a routine patrol, officer Daniel Carter happens upon a blood-soaked figure limping down a deserted stretch of road. He rushes the young man to a nearby rural hospital staffed by a skeleton crew, only to discover that patients and personnel are transforming into something inhuman. As the horror intensifies, Carter leads the other survivors on a hellish voyage into the subterranean depths of the hospital in a desperate bid to end the nightmare before it's too late.
movie.actors: Aaron Poole, Kenneth Welsh, Daniel Fathers, Kathleen Munroe

movie.title: Lion
movie.plot: A five-year-old Indian boy gets lost on the streets of Calcutta, thousands of kilometers from home. He survives many challenges before being adopted by a couple in Australia; 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.
movie.actors: Sunny Pawar, Abhishek Bharate, Priyanka Bose, Khushi Solanki
movie.writer: Saroo Brierley (adapted from the book "A Long Way Home" by), Luke Davies (screenplay)

movie.title: Passengers
movie.plot: A spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet and transporting thousands of people has a malfunction in its sleep chambers. As a result, two passengers are awakened 90 years early.
movie.actors: Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt, Michael Sheen, Laurence Fishburne

movie.title: Hacksaw Ridge
movie.plot: WWII American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first Conscientious Objector in American history to win the Congressional Medal of Honor.
movie.actors: Andrew Garfield, Richard Pyros, Jacob Warner, Milo Gibson

movie.title: Trolls
movie.plot: Lovable and friendly, the trolls love to play around. But one day, a mysterious giant shows up to end the party. Poppy, the optimistic leader of the Trolls, and her polar opposite, Branch, must embark on an adventure that takes them far beyond the only world they’ve ever known.
movie.actors: Anna Kendrick, Justin Timberlake, Zooey Deschanel, Christopher Mintz-Plasse
movie.writer: Jonathan Aibel (screenplay), Glenn Berger (screenplay), Erica Rivinoja (story by), Thomas Dam (based on the Good Luck Trolls created by)

movie.title: The Promise
movie.plot: Set during the last days of the Ottoman Empire, The Promise follows a love triangle between Michael, a brilliant medical student, the beautiful and sophisticated artist Ana, and Chris - a renowned American journalist based in Paris.
movie.actors: Christian Bale, Oscar Isaac, Shohreh Aghdashloo, Angela Sarafyan

movie.title: Hidden Figures
movie.plot: The untold story of Katherine G. Johnson, Dorothy Vaughan and Mary Jackson – brilliant African-American women working at NASA and serving as the brains behind one of the greatest operations in history – the launch of astronaut John Glenn into orbit. The visionary trio crossed all gender and race lines to inspire generations to dream big.
movie.actors: Taraji P. Henson, Octavia Spencer, Janelle Monáe, Kevin Costner
movie.writer: Allison Schroeder (screenplay), Theodore Melfi (screenplay), Margot Lee Shetterly (based on the book by)

movie.title: Boyka: Undisputed IV
movie.plot: In the fourth installment of the fighting franchise, Boyka is shooting for the big leagues when an accidental death in the ring makes him question everything he stands for. When he finds out the wife of the man he accidentally killed is in trouble, Boyka offers to fight in a series of impossible battles to free her from a life of servitude
movie.actors: Scott Adkins, Teodora Duhovnikova, Alon Aboutboul, Julian Vergov

movie.title: Arrival
movie.plot: Taking place after alien crafts land around the world, an expert linguist is recruited by the military to determine whether they come in peace or are a threat.
movie.actors: Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner, Forest Whitaker, Michael Stuhlbarg
movie.writer: Eric Heisserer (screenplay), Ted Chiang (based on the story "Story of Your Life" written by)

movie.title: War Dogs
movie.plot: Based on the true story of two young men, David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli, who won a $300 million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan.
movie.actors: Miles Teller, Steve Lantz, Gregg Weiner, David Packouz
movie.writer: Stephen Chin (screenplay), Todd Phillips (screenplay), Jason Smilovic (screenplay), Guy Lawson (Rolling Stone article "Arms and the Dudes")

movie.title: The Great Wall
movie.plot: European mercenaries searching for black powder become embroiled in the defense of the Great Wall of China against a horde of monstrous creatures.
movie.actors: Matt Damon, Tian Jing, Willem Dafoe, Andy Lau
movie.writer: Carlo Bernard (screenplay), Doug Miro (screenplay), Tony Gilroy (screenplay), Max Brooks (story by), Edward Zwick (story by), Marshall Herskovitz (story by)

movie.title: Mine
movie.plot: After a failed assassination attempt, a soldier finds himself stranded in the desert. Exposed to the elements, he must survive the dangers of the desert and battle the psychological and physical toll of the treacherous conditions.
movie.actors: Armie Hammer, Annabelle Wallis, Tom Cullen, Clint Dyer

movie.title: The Founder
movie.plot: The true story of how Ray Kroc, a salesman from Illinois, met Mac and Dick McDonald, who were running a burger operation in 1950s Southern California. Kroc was impressed by the brothers’ speedy system of making the food and saw franchise potential. He maneuvered himself into a position to be able to pull the company from the brothers and create a billion-dollar empire.
movie.actors: Michael Keaton, Nick Offerman, John Carroll Lynch, Linda Cardellini

movie.title: Suicide Squad
movie.plot: From DC Comics comes the Suicide Squad, an antihero team of incarcerated supervillains who act as deniable assets for the United States government, undertaking high-risk black ops missions in exchange for commuted prison sentences.
movie.actors: Will Smith, Jaime FitzSimons, Ike Barinholtz, Margot Robbie

movie.title: Your Name.
movie.plot: High schoolers Mitsuha and Taki are complete strangers living separate lives. But one night, they suddenly switch places. Mitsuha wakes up in Taki’s body, and he in hers. This bizarre occurrence continues to happen randomly, and the two must adjust their lives around each other.
movie.actors: Ryûnosuke Kamiki, Mone Kamishiraishi, Ryô Narita, Aoi Yuki
movie.writer: Makoto Shinkai (based on his novel), Makoto Shinkai (screenplay), Clark Cheng (english script)

movie.title: Why Him?
movie.plot: Ned, an overprotective dad, visits his daughter at Stanford where he meets his biggest nightmare: her well-meaning but socially awkward Silicon Valley billionaire boyfriend, Laird. A rivalry develops and Ned's panic level goes through the roof when he finds himself lost in this glamorous high-tech world and learns Laird is about to pop the question.
movie.actors: Zoey Deutch, James Franco, Tangie Ambrose, Cedric the Entertainer
movie.writer: John Hamburg (screenplay), Ian Helfer (screenplay), Jonah Hill (story by), John Hamburg (story by), Ian Helfer (story by)

movie.title: The Ticket
movie.plot: A blind man who regains his vision finds himself becoming metaphorically blinded by his obsession for the superficial.
movie.actors: Dan Stevens, Malin Akerman, Kerry Bishé, Oliver Platt

movie.title: Nocturnal Animals
movie.plot: Susan Morrow receives a book manuscript from her ex-husband – a man she left 20 years earlier – asking for her opinion of his writing. As she reads, she is drawn into the fictional life of Tony Hastings, a mathematics professor whose family vacation turns violent.
movie.actors: Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal, Michael Shannon, Aaron Taylor-Johnson

movie.title: Office Christmas Party
movie.plot: When his uptight CEO sister threatens to shut down his branch, the branch manager throws an epic Christmas party in order to land a big client and save the day, but the party gets way out of hand.
movie.actors: Jason Bateman, Olivia Munn, T.J. Miller, Jennifer Aniston
movie.writer: Justin Malen (screenplay), Laura Solon (screenplay), Dan Mazer (screenplay), Jon Lucas (story), Scott Moore (story), Timothy Dowling (story)

movie.title: Chuck
movie.plot: A drama inspired by the life of heavyweight boxer Chuck Wepner.
movie.actors: Naomi Watts, Ron Perlman, Liev Schreiber, Elisabeth Moss

movie.title: Patriots Day
movie.plot: An account of Boston Police Commissioner Ed Davis's actions in the events leading up to the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing and the aftermath, which includes the city-wide manhunt to find the terrorists behind it.
movie.actors: Mark Wahlberg, Dicky Eklund Jr., Michael Marchand, Rhet Kidd
movie.writer: Peter Berg (screenplay), Matt Cook (screenplay), Joshua Zetumer (screenplay), Peter Berg (story), Matt Cook (story), Paul Tamasy (story), Eric Johnson (story)

movie.title: Doctor Strange
movie.plot: After his career is destroyed, a brilliant but arrogant surgeon gets a new lease on life when a sorcerer takes him under his wing and trains him to defend the world against evil.
movie.actors: Benedict Cumberbatch, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Rachel McAdams, Benedict Wong
movie.writer: Jon Spaihts, Scott Derrickson, C. Robert Cargill, Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Steve Ditko (based on the Marvel comics by)

movie.title: Moonlight
movie.plot: The tender, heartbreaking story of a young man’s struggle to find himself, told across three defining chapters in his life as he experiences the ecstasy, pain, and beauty of falling in love, while grappling with his own sexuality.
movie.actors: Mahershala Ali, Shariff Earp, Duan Sanderson, Alex R. Hibbert
movie.writer: Barry Jenkins (screenplay), Tarell Alvin McCraney (story by)

movie.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
movie.plot: Father and son coroners who receive a mysterious homicide victim with no apparent cause of death. As they attempt to identify the beautiful young "Jane Doe," they discover increasingly bizarre clues that hold the key to her terrifying secrets.
movie.actors: Brian Cox, Emile Hirsch, Ophelia Lovibond, Michael McElhatton

movie.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
movie.plot: After the re-emergence of the world's first mutant, world-destroyer Apocalypse, the X-Men must unite to defeat his extinction level plan.
movie.actors: James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Jennifer Lawrence, Nicholas Hoult
movie.writer: Simon Kinberg (screenplay), Bryan Singer (story), Simon Kinberg (story), Michael Dougherty (story), Dan Harris (story)

movie.title: Free Fire
movie.plot: A crime drama set in 1970s Boston, about a gun sale which goes wrong.
movie.actors: Enzo Cilenti, Sam Riley, Michael Smiley, Brie Larson

movie.title: Assassin's Creed
movie.plot: Through unlocked genetic memories that allow him to relive the adventures of his ancestor in 15th century Spain, Callum Lynch discovers he's a descendant of the secret 'Assassins' society. After gaining incredible knowledge and skills, he is now poised to take on the oppressive Knights Templar in the present day.
movie.actors: Michael Fassbender, Marion Cotillard, Jeremy Irons, Brendan Gleeson
movie.writer: Michael Lesslie (screenplay), Adam Cooper (screenplay), Bill Collage (screenplay)

movie.title: Colossal
movie.plot: A woman discovers that severe catastrophic events are somehow connected to the mental breakdown from which she's suffering.
movie.actors: Dan Stevens, Anne Hathaway, Jason Sudeikis, Tim Blake Nelson

movie.title: Silence
movie.plot: Two Jesuit priests travel to seventeenth century Japan which has, under the Tokugawa shogunate, banned Catholicism and almost all foreign contact.
movie.actors: Andrew Garfield, Adam Driver, Liam Neeson, Tadanobu Asano
movie.writer: Jay Cocks (screenplay), Martin Scorsese (screenplay), Shûsaku Endô (based on the novel by)

movie.title: The Bad Batch
movie.plot: A love story set in a community of cannibals in a future dystopia. In a desert wasteland in Texas, a muscled cannibal breaks one important rule: don’t play with your food.
movie.actors: Keanu Reeves, Jason Momoa, Jim Carrey, Giovanni Ribisi

movie.title: Manchester by the Sea
movie.plot: After his older brother passes away, Lee Chandler is forced to return home to care for his 16-year-old nephew. There he is compelled to deal with a tragic past that separated him from his family and the community where he was born and raised.
movie.actors: Casey Affleck, Ben O'Brien, Kyle Chandler, Richard Donelly

movie.title: Brimstone
movie.plot: In the menacing inferno of the old American West, Liz is a genuine survivor who is hunted by a vengeful preacher for a crime she didn’t commit.
movie.actors: Dakota Fanning, Guy Pearce, Carice van Houten, Kit Harington

movie.title: Deadpool
movie.plot: Based upon Marvel Comics’ most unconventional anti-hero, DEADPOOL tells the origin story of former Special Forces operative turned mercenary Wade Wilson, who after being subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers, adopts the alter ego Deadpool. Armed with his new abilities and a dark, twisted sense of humor, Deadpool hunts down the man who nearly destroyed his life.
movie.actors: Ryan Reynolds, Karan Soni, Ed Skrein, Michael Benyaer

movie.title: The BFG
movie.plot: The BFG is no ordinary bone-crunching giant. He is far too nice and jumbly. It's lucky for Sophie that he is. Had she been carried off in the middle of the night by the Bloodbottler, or any of the other giants—rather than the BFG—she would have soon become breakfast. When Sophie hears that the giants are flush-bunking off to England to swollomp a few nice little chiddlers, she decides she must stop them once and for all. And the BFG is going to help her!
movie.actors: Mark Rylance, Ruby Barnhill, Penelope Wilton, Jemaine Clement

movie.title: Raw
movie.plot: In Justine’s family everyone is a vet and a vegetarian. At 16, she’s a gifted teen ready to take on her first year in vet school, where her older sister also studies. There, she gets no time to settle: hazing starts right away. Justine is forced to eat raw meat for the first time in her life. Unexpected consequences emerge as her true self begins to form.
movie.actors: Garance Marillier, Ella Rumpf, Rabah Nait Oufella, Laurent Lucas

movie.title: Allied
movie.plot: In 1942, an intelligence officer in North Africa encounters a female French Resistance fighter on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. When they reunite in London, their relationship is tested by the pressures of war.
movie.actors: Brad Pitt, Vincent Ebrahim, Xavier De Guillebon, Marion Cotillard

movie.title: Kubo and the Two Strings
movie.plot: Kubo mesmerizes the people in his village with his magical gift for spinning wild tales with origami. When he accidentally summons an evil spirit seeking vengeance, Kubo is forced to go on a quest to solve the mystery of his fallen samurai father and his mystical weaponry, as well as discover his own magical powers.
movie.actors: Art Parkinson, Charlize Theron, Ralph Fiennes, Brenda Vaccaro
movie.writer: Marc Haimes (screenplay), Chris Butler (screenplay), Shannon Tindle (story by), Marc Haimes (story by)

movie.title: The Girl on the Train
movie.plot: Rachel Watson, devastated by her recent divorce, spends her daily commute fantasizing about the seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes every day, until one morning she sees something shocking happen there and becomes entangled in the mystery that unfolds.
movie.actors: Emily Blunt, Haley Bennett, Rebecca Ferguson, Justin Theroux

movie.title: Don't Breathe
movie.plot: A group of teens break into a blind man's home thinking they'll get away with the perfect crime. They're wrong.
movie.actors: Stephen Lang, Jane Levy, Dylan Minnette, Daniel Zovatto

movie.title: Star Trek Beyond
movie.plot: The USS Enterprise crew explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a mysterious new enemy who puts them and everything the Federation stands for to the test.
movie.actors: Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Karl Urban, Zoe Saldana
movie.writer: Simon Pegg, Doug Jung, Gene Roddenberry (based upon "Star Trek" created by)

movie.title: Collateral Beauty
movie.plot: Retreating from life after a tragedy, a man questions the universe by writing to Love, Time and Death. Receiving unexpected answers, he begins to see how these things interlock and how even loss can reveal moments of meaning and beauty.
movie.actors: Will Smith, Edward Norton, Kate Winslet, Michael Peña

movie.title: Below Her Mouth
movie.plot: An unexpected affair quickly escalates into a heart-stopping reality for two women whose passionate connection changes their lives forever.
movie.actors: Erika Linder, Natalie Krill, Sebastian Pigott, Mayko Nguyen

movie.title: Monster Trucks
movie.plot: Looking for any way to get away from the life and town he was born into, Tripp, a high school senior, builds a Monster Truck from bits and pieces of scrapped cars. After an accident at a nearby oil-drilling site displaces a strange and subterranean creature with a taste and a talent for speed, Tripp may have just found the key to getting out of town and a most unlikely friend.
movie.actors: Lucas Till, Jane Levy, Thomas Lennon, Barry Pepper
movie.writer: Derek Connolly (screenplay), Matthew Robinson (story by), Jonathan Aibel (story by), Glenn Berger (story by)
